Posts.Title: stage iv help

Posts.Content: wife is 5 years tx for stage iv breast cancer which is advancing, she has brain, bone, liver and pleural mets and her onchologist is giving up, she failed herceptin, xeloda, tykerb, perjecta and navelbine.  what are other stage iv people doing? any advice for alternative medications? please help
Posts.Title: stage iv help

Posts.Content: yes she takes vit c and vit d plus calcium thanks
